preclusion: Graduate seminar modules by other departments
prerequisite: Registration as Graduate Student in the Department of Chemistry
moduleDescription: This is a required module for all research Masters and PhD students admitted fromAY2004/2005. The main purpose of this module is to help graduate students to improve their scientific presentation skills and to participate in scientific seminars/exchanges in a professional manner. The module will be spread over 2 Semesters and be graded "Satisfactory/Unsatisfactory"grade on the basis of student presentation and participation.
